{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++23|
friend constexpr difference_type operator-( std::default_sentinel_t s,
                                            const /*inner-iterator*/&amp; i )
    requires ranges::sized_sentinel_for&lt;ranges::sentinel_t&lt;V&gt;,
                                        ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++23|
friend constexpr difference_type operator-( const /*inner-iterator*/&amp; i,
                                            std::default_sentinel_t s )
    requires ranges::sized_sentinel_for&lt;ranges::sentinel_t&lt;V&gt;,
                                        ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Calculates the distance (in number of underlying elements) between the {{rlp|/|iterator}} and [[cpp/iterator/default_sentinel_t|sentinel]].

Let {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} be the underlying pointer to the enclosing {{tt|chunk_view}}.

@1@ Equivalent to:&lt;br&gt;{{c|1=
return ranges::min(i.parent_-&gt;remainder_,
                   ranges::end(i.parent_-&gt;base_) - *i.parent_-&gt;current_);
}}

@2@ Equivalent to: {{c|1=return -(s - i);}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|{{tt|std::ranges::chunk_view::''inner-iterator''}}|plural=yes}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|i|the {{rlp|/|iterator}}}}
{{par|s|the sentinel}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The distance between given iterator and sentinel.
